pages.text: $(li)The Cave Root is a basic food that can be found like roots inside of the caves of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)You can use it to brew a $(l:patchouli:potions/quark/fortitude)Potion of Fortitude$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can feed a $(l:patchouli:creatures/quark/toretoise)Toretoise$(/l) with them to regenerate its ores on its back too.
